description: This file defines a Dart class 'ChatMessage' representing a chat message with its properties, serialization/deserialization methods, and an enum 'MessageStatus' indicating message states.

classes.name: ChatMessage
classes.description: Represents a chat message between two users, including properties like id, sender, receiver, content, timestamp, and status, with methods for copying, converting to/from map.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the ChatMessage with optional updated status.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Serializes the ChatMessage instance into a Map<String, dynamic>.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Factory constructor that creates a ChatMessage instance from a Map<String, dynamic>.
